artist: Artist: Hashiguchi Goyō; Producer: Posthumously produced by Hashiguchi Yasuo
creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: woman leaning over, with garment off her PR shoulder, reaching toward a bucket with a towel; woman reflected in a pool of water at bottom; steam at R
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: 五葉画 {Goyō ga} (picture by Goyō) | 大正九年八月 {Taishō kunen hachigatsu} (August 1920)
text: Posthumously printed ca. 1950-52. A woman has begun to undress so she can clean herself before entering the bathtub in which her mirror image is visible.
title: Woman at a Hot Spring
